pageTitle: INFO: Latest eWallet Upgrades and Version Numbers | Ilium Software Support
textBeforeTable: Current Versions To share information you need the same major version of eWallet on each device. Make sure to install the latest version on all of your devices. Version Information Add eWallet for Android devices For just $9.99, you can add eWallet to your Android device from Google Play. Now you can access your data on your Android phone or tablet too! If you already have a license for eWallet for Android, the Google Play should allow you to upgrade to the latest version that meets your system specifications at no additional cost. Looking for eWallet to run on your Kindle Fire? eWallet is also available from the Amazon Appstore. eWallet 7 for Android Add eWallet for iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch Plus, for just $9.99 you can add eWallet for your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch on the iTunes App Store. Get all of the great features you've come to expect from eWallet on your iOS device! If you already have a license for eWallet for iOS, the App Store should allow you to upgrade to the latest version that meets your system specifications at no additional cost. eWallet 8 for iOS If you already have a license for eWallet for Windows Store (Windows 8/RT full screen), the Windows Store should allow you to upgrade to the
